ench.name: Aqua Affinity
ench.desc: Speeds up how fast you can mine blocks underwater

ench.name: Bane of Arthropods
ench.desc: Increases attack damage against arthropods

ench.name: Blast Protection
ench.desc: Reduces blast and explosion damage

ench.name: Channeling
ench.desc: Summons a lightning bolt at a targeted mob when enchanted item is thrown (targeted mob must be standing in raining)

ench.name: Curse of Binding
ench.desc: Cursed item can not be removed from player

ench.name: Curse of Vanishing
ench.desc: Cursed item will disappear after player dies

ench.name: Depth Strider
ench.desc: Speeds up how fast you can move underwater

ench.name: Efficiency
ench.desc: Increases how fast you can mine

ench.name: Feather Falling
ench.desc: Reduces fall and teleportation damage

ench.name: Fire Aspect
ench.desc: Sets target on fire

ench.name: Fire Protection
ench.desc: Reduces damage caused by fire and lava

ench.name: Flame
ench.desc: Turns arrows into flaming arrows

ench.name: Fortune
ench.desc: Increases block drops from mining

ench.name: Frost Walker
ench.desc: Freezes water into ice so that you can walk on it

ench.name: Impaling
ench.desc: Increases attack damage again sea creatures

ench.name: Infinity
ench.desc: Shoots an infinite amount of arrows

ench.name: Knockback
ench.desc: Increases knockback dealt (enemies repel backwards)

ench.name: Looting
ench.desc: Increases amount of loot dropped when mob is killed

ench.name: Loyalty
ench.desc: Returns your weapon when it is thrown like a spear

ench.name: Luck of the Sea
ench.desc: Increases chances of catching valuable items

ench.name: Lure
ench.desc: Increases the rate of fish biting your hook

ench.name: Mending
ench.desc: Uses xp to mend your tools, weapons and armor

ench.name: Power
ench.desc: Increases damage dealt by bow

ench.name: Projectile Protection
ench.desc: Reduces projectile damage (arrows, fireballs, fire charges)

ench.name: Protection
ench.desc: General protection against attacks, fire, lava, and falling

ench.name: Punch
ench.desc: Increases knockback dealt (enemies repel backwards)

ench.name: Respiration
ench.desc: Extends underwater breathing (see better underwater)

ench.name: Riptide
ench.desc: Propels the player forward when enchanted item is thrown while in water or rain

ench.name: Sharpness
ench.desc: Increases attack damage dealt to mobs

ench.name: Silk Touch
ench.desc: Mines blocks themselves (fragile items)

ench.name: Smite
ench.desc: Increases attack damage against undead mobs

ench.name: Sweeping Edge
ench.desc: Increases damage of sweep attack

ench.name: Thorns
ench.desc: Causes damage to attackers

ench.name: Unbreaking
ench.desc: Increases durability of item
